## Shape.LinkedCell property

Gets or sets the worksheet range linked to the control's value.

```csharp
public string LinkedCell { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LinkedCell.Equals("$B$6"))
    shape.LinkedCell = "A1";
```
